programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.desc: Former Labour home secretary Alan Johnson takes over the reins for extended edition of the satirical quiz, with comedian Janey Godley and journalist and political commentator Tim Shipman joining team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to poke fun at the stories making the headlines.

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life Is Goodish
programme.desc: Computer games adverts, board games, crosswords and Sudoku books all come under the spotlight, while Dave's jigsaw habit is revealed, and Alan Sugar makes a puzzling appearance.

programme.title: Alan Davies: As Yet Untitled
programme.desc: Stand-up comic and QI panellist Alan Davies is joined in conversation by Phill Jupitus, Stuart Maconie, Pippa Evans and Carl Donnelly.

programme.title: Alan Davies: As Yet Untitled
programme.desc: Jason Byrne, Denise Van Outen, Josh Widdicombe and Alice Levine join Alan to discuss such varied topics as acts of charity, stealing from the Royal Family and tough crowds.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: The discovery of a wreck off the coast of Florida sends a team of underwater explorers on a mission to discover the identity of a ship that simply shouldn't exist.

programme.title: SAS: Rogue Warriors
programme.desc: Ben Macintyre uses the SAS archives to examine the history of the British Army special forces unit combining documents, unseen footage and interviews with its founding members to tell the remarkable story behind an extraordinary fighting force. In the first edition, he looks at its formation in the heat of the north African desert in 1941, when eccentric young British army officer David Archibald Stirling had a vision for a new kind of war in which the enemy was attacked from behind their own lines.

programme.title: Wild Caribbean
programme.desc: The varied landscape of the tropical islands and the species that inhabit them, from flamingos and four-eyed fish to anteaters and cave-dwelling rodents. The programme also delves deeper to explore the islands' destructive history of volcanic eruptions, dangerous reefs and powerful hurricanes.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Trial & Retribution
programme.desc: First of a two-part story by Lynda La Plante in which the team investigate the death of a prostitute who plunged from the balcony of a block of luxury apartments. They discover she was the daughter of a famous Seventies TV star murdered 12 years previously, whose killer was never traced, and try to find a link between the two crimes. David Hayman stars as the newly promoted DCS Michael Walker, alongside Victoria Smurfit, Colin Salmon and Frances Barber.

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: The normally resourceful barrister struggles to come up with a defence when confronted with a client who openly admits to the court that she killed her husband. To make matters worse, he is also co-opted into acting on behalf of wayward colleague Jeremy Aldermarten, whose tendency to take liberties has led to accusations of professional misconduct. Drama, starring John Thaw and Lynda Steadman.

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: A victimised German pensioner in a residential home asks Hetty to help trace his long-lost sister. Intent on setting the world to rights, the tenacious sleuth soon finds the elderly gentleman has a few surprises in store. Detective drama, starring Patricia Routledge, Richard Pasco and Suzanne Maddock.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Babushka
programme.desc: Game show hosted by Rylan Clark-Neal in which contestants answer questions to get the chance to open a set of giant Russian nesting dolls, with some empty and others containing prizes up to Â£10,000

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Don't Stop The Party!
programme.desc: It's party time! Expect back-to-back hits all night long...

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Kisstory Presents: R&B Anthems
programme.desc: Kisstory is taking over and bringing you some of the best R&B anthems.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: Shake It Off: Ultimate Tens Party
programme.desc: Let's get this party started with some of the biggest party tracks from the Tens.

programme.title: All The Hits, All Night
programme.desc: Non-stop hits to see you all the way through the night.

programme.title: Jungle Gold
programme.desc: After racking up huge debts on the barren Romaso gold mine, Scott and George decide to dig elsewhere. But can they satisfy their investors that the new site will make a profit?.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson examines bizarre markings that suggest a violent clash between prehistoric beasts, and in California, he investigates whether a strange lake might be home to alien life.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: Mikey launches a charity fundraising campaign, OCC begins an eco-friendly build and PJD unveils a new bike. Senior also takes steps to be reunited with his sons.

programme.title: Aircraft Stories
programme.desc: The development of British fighter planes in the 20th century, exploring how influential they proved to be during the First and Second World Wars.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike Rowe learns first-hand how hard it is to manufacture potato crisps, before carrying out an unpleasant job in the Colorado town of Rifle.

programme.title: How It's Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The inner workings of the Ginetta and Team LNT, who have made headway in auto racing history for decades.

programme.title: How It's Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The team visits the birthplace of the Lucra LC470, and examines the car's inner workings.
